maqras.text: sillo ingan-eun changjodoeeoss-eudoe chimchaghaji moshago
jaeang-i ileul ttaemyeon keuge seulpeo hamyeo
haeng-un-i chaj-adeul ttaeneun insaeghae hadeola
geuleona yebaee chungsilhan jadeul eun geuleohji anihani
hangsang yebaehaneun geudeul-ila
geudeul-ui jaemul-eun jeongdanghan geos-eulo
guhaneun jadeul-ina guhaji a nihan jadeul-eul wihae sayonghago
simpan-ui nal-ui jinlileul bad-eudeul imyeo
junim-ui eungbeol-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul-ila
sillo hananim-ui eungbeol-eun bulga pihan geos-idoe
sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-eun je-oe la
geuleona anaedeulgwa geudeul-ui o leun son-i soyuhan jadeul-eun heolagdoen geos-idoe
geuleona ileul wibanhan geos-eun bul-uihan jadeul-ila
sin-yong-eul jikigo yagsog-eul ihaeng haneun jadeulgwa
jeung-eon-eul ham-e jeongjighan jadeulgwa
yebaesaenghwal-e chungsilhan jadeul-eun
chugbogbad-eun cheongug-e issge doelila
geuleona geudae juwileul geubhi seodulleo doljinhaneun bulsinjadeul-egeneun eotteon il-i issgessneunyo
oleunjjoggwa oenjjog-eseo wae tteji eo anj-a issneunyo
geudeul gagjaneun chugbogbad-eun cheongug eulo deul-eogalyeo galmanghaneunyo
gyeolko geuleohge doel su eobsnani hananim-eun geudeul-i algo issneun geos-eu lo changjohayeossnola
dongjjoggwa seojjog-ui junimkke maengse hasa gwonseneun geubunkke issnola
geudeulboda na-eun daleun baegseongdeul lo geudeul-eul daechehal su iss-eumyeo hananim-eun geuleohge ham-e bujogham-i eobsno la
geuleomeulo geudeul-i mu-ighan dae hwa-e ppajyeo geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geunal e jigmyeonhal ttaekkaji mankkighadolog beo lyeodula
geudeul-i geudeul-ui mudeom-eulo bu teo seodeulleo naoneun geunal geudeul-eun machi seodulleo usang-egelo ganeun geos gatdeola
sil-uie ppajin geudeul-ui nundeul-eun alaelo naelyeojyeo iss-eumyeo suchiga geu deul-eul ewossani geuleoham-i geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun nal-ila
sillo hananim-i noaleul geuui baegseong-ege bonaem-eun geudeul wie gotong seuleoun eungbeol-i imhagi jeon-e baegseong deul-ege gyeong-gohagoja hasyeoss-euni
geuga malhayeossdeola baegseongdeul-iyeo sillo naneun bunmyeonghan gyeong-gojaloseo neo huiege wassnola
hananim-eul gyeongbaehago geubun man-euldulyeowo hamyeo na-ege sunjonghala
geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo neohuiui jalmos-eul yongseohasa iljeong gigankkaji neo huileul yuyehana sillo hananim-ui yu ye gigan-i ileul ttaemyeon yuyedoel su eobsnola
geuga malhayeossdeola juyeo jeoneun bamnaj-eulo jeohui baegseongdeul-eul indohalyeohayeossseubnida
geuleona midneun jadeul-eun jeung-gahaji anihago baleun gil-eseo beos-eonaneun jadeul-i neul-eonassseubnida
dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul yongseohal geos-i la jega malhal ttaemada geudeul-eun geudeul ui songalag-eulo gwileul maggo os-eul yeo mimyeo geoyeoghago omanhal ppun-ibnida
geulihayeo jeoneun geudeul-ege soli nop-yeo hosohayeossseubnida
daejung ap-eseodo geulaessgo boiji anhgedo hosohaess-eumyeo
junim-eulobuteo yongseoleul guhalasillo geubun-eun gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasin bun-ila malhayeossgo
geubunkkeseo neohuiege bileul nae lidoe pungseongke hayeo jusimyeo
jaesangwa jason-eul deohayeo jusi go gwasuwongwa mul-i heuleuneun gang-eul neo huiege jusineun bun-isilago hayeossseub nida
geuleonde neohuiga hananim-ui wi daeham-eul dulyeowo haji anihan geos-eun eotteon il-inyo
sillo geubun-eun yeoleogaji seolo daleun dangyeleul geochyeo neohuileul changjoha syeossnola
hananimgeseo cheung-eul dueo ilgob gaeui haneul-eul mandeusin geos-eul alji moshaneunyo
dal-eul dusimae bich-eul bansake hago taeyang-eul dusimae deungbul-i doege ha syeossnola
hananim-eun chomog-i seongjanghadeus neohuileul daejiwieseo seongjangke haess-eumyeo
geuleon hu neohuileul buhwalke hasinila
hananim-eun neohuileul wihayeo dae jileul yungdancheoleom pyeolchyeo jusyeoss-euni
ineun neohuilo hayeogeum geu an-uineolb-eun gildeul-eul hwalbohadoleug ham-ila
noaneun gyesoghayeo malhayeossdeolajuyeo sillo geudeul-eun jeoleul geoyeoghago geudeul-ui jaesangwa jasondeul-ege heoagman eul kkichineun jadeul-eul ttaleul ppun-ibnida
geudeul-eun keunakeun eummoleul kkumimyeo
neohui sindeul-eul beoliji malla was deudo ssuwado geuligo yagusseuwa ya ukkeu geuligo naseuleu sindeul-eul dannyeom haeseoneun anidoendago seologa seolo-e ge malhayeossdeola
geudeul-eun imi manh-eun mulileul yuhoghayeoss-euni juyeo dangsinkkeseo deo i sang banghwanghaneun jadeul-eul je-oehagoneun geudeul-ui joeag-eul jeung-gahaji anhdolog hayeo jusoseo
geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-eun igsahayeossgo buljiog-e deul-eo gage doeeoss-euni hananim oeeneun geu deul-eul doul ja amudo eobsnola
noaga malhayeossdeola juyeo dae jiwie han salamdo bulsinjalo beolyeo duji maobsoseo
dangsinkkeseo geudeul jung-e han bulsin jalado namgyeo dusindamyeon geudeul-eun dang sin-ui jongdeul-eul yuhoghayeo saaghan ja deullo mandeul geos-ibnida

juyeo jeoleul yongseohayeo jusa jeo ui bumowa mid-eum-eulo jeoui jib-e deul eoon jadeulgwa midneun salamdeulgwa midneun yeoseongdeul-eul yongseohayeo jusigo joeindeul egeman beol-eul jeung-gahayeo jusoseo
